DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Aggressive Crystals
Traits.Content: Whenever a creature hits the vein in melee, shards burst out; the attacker must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 13) or take 1d6 piercing damage.

Traits.Name: Loyal Protection
Traits.Content: Instead of moving, the Aggressive Ore Vein retaliates against attackers with its Crystal Lash ability, dealing increased damage of 2d8 piercing.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Aggressive Ore Vein makes two attacks: one with its Crystal Lash and one with its Shatter Pulse.

Actions.Name: Crystal Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. The vein lashes out with razor-sharp shards, dealing 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Shatter Pulse
Actions.Content: Recharge 5–6: The vein emits a crack of crystal energy. All creatures within 15 ft. must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 13) or take 9 (2d8) thunder damage and be deafened until the end of their next turn.
